title._content: Image taken from page 73 of 'The Water Lily on the Danube: being a brief account of the perils of a pair-oar, during a voyage from Lambeth to Pesth. By the author of the 'Log of the Water Lily' [i.e. Robert Blackford Mansfield], etc. [With plates.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Water Lily on the Danube: being a brief account of the perils of a pair-oar, during a voyage from Lambeth to Pesth.
